title: Teenage movies in competition
brief_description: Contains excerpts from twelve award-winning films made by young filmmakers “out to communicate ideas…to make a personal statement… to examine a civic problem…to educate or just to have fun.” All films submitted for the “Teenage Movies Competition” run by Kodak.
